titles.title: Housing Recovery Act of 2011

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to except from the early distribution penalty certain qualified retirement plan distributions used to purchase a residence that has been in foreclosure for a year or more.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/13/2011--Introduced. Housing Recovery Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a premature distribution from a tax-exempt retirement plan without penalty if such distribution is used to acquire a residence which has been in foreclosure for one year prior to the date of such acquisition and such residence is not sold or otherwise disposed of for two years beginning on the date of such acquisition.
